name: Cloudways WordPress Migrator
author: Cloudways

sections.description:
The Cloudways WordPress Migrator plugin automates WordPress migration(s) from any other hosting provider to Cloudways, the World’s Easiest Cloud Hosting Platform. The only requirement from your end is to provide the Cloudways SFTP details to the Plugin. Sit back and relax as the Migrator does the tedious work for you!

This tool saves valuable time for all kinds of website owners.

Agencies

• You don’t need in-house technical experts to manage the complicated procedure of migrating your websites to the Cloudways Cloud Platform.
• Your website themes and plugins are preserved with utmost care.

Developers

• Focus your efforts on time-critical projects, instead of spending hours on manual migrations.
• Database values are updated automatically, providing seamless transition to the Cloudways Platform.

Ecommerce Merchants

• All product pages, themes, and customer records are moved to Cloudways easily.
• Minimum downtime to ensure your sales are affected as little as possible. There’s no faster way to move an ecommerce site!

Small and Medium Enterprises

• The Cloudways WordPress Migrator is best for SMEs who don’t have the resources to employ specialists to handle their website migration.
• Search Engine Rank Positions (SERP) won’t fall. Your SEO links stays intact. So, there will be no adverse effects on SEO.
• It’s as easy as 1-2-3! The Cloudways Platform specializes in serving SMEs, as does this plugin.

Bloggers

• Your widgets and customizations stay in one piece.
• All your ad codes, referral codes, and media files integrated into your posts will be transferred without any breakage.

* Please Note *

This plugin will only migrate your site to Cloudways. This will not migrate you to any other host.
sections.installation:
Method 1

1- Download the plugin and extract the zip file.
2- Upload bv-cloudways-automated-migration plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
3- Activate the plugin through WordPress admin “Plugin” tab.

Method 2

1- Navigate to Plugins -> Add New and search for Cloudways migrator.
2- Install and Activate the plugin to use it.

Method 3

If you are comfortable using WP-CLI (WordPress Commmand Line), then you can easily install the plugin by running this command in SSH terminal.

wp plugin install bv-cloudways-automated-migration
sections.faq:
Why do you need my email?

We require an email address to send you updates on the migration process, notify you of any errors that occur during the migration.

sections.reviews:
Worked for me! Twice

By aph5 on February 5, 2024

Just used this plugin to migrate 2 sites, and it worked well.

Main thing I needed to do after was a "find and replace" on the database for cloudways URLs, to replace them with the domain URL.

Would happily use again.

WASTE OF TIME!

By paoolo on November 27, 2023

I honestly created an account just to post this.

This migration tool is dumb and not working at all! We are trying to migrate our site using this for 4 TIMES using this and all failed.

Support is no help at all. Im so DISAPPOINTED!

If you need to migrate a critical site, do not use CLOUDWAYS!

It works on most sites except one today

By Steven (skylabb) on September 29, 2023

For the most part, the plugin works flawlessly and quickly to copy a WP to another WP installation on Cloudway server. Until today. I have a client site hosted with NameCheap and am not having success copying over using this plugin. Copying process completed successfully. However, when I view the destination site (on Cloudway server) I get an error of something along the line 'Redis connection error.." Can't log in the admin either because of the error. I redid the process 3 times, same problem. The site is a simple site with less than 100mb of data and files. I used another migration plugin, I could copy the site over with no problem.

Damn good plugin

By Hankie (joeriwetters) on July 17, 2023

Safes a ton of work!!

Flawless everytime

By klaggy on February 27, 2023

Used this plugin over 20 times, never had a single problem, smooth...

It is the most useful plugin.

By Pramod Khedekar (ctrltech) on January 5, 2023

I recently shifted my websites from Godaddy to Cloudways. And migration was very smooth and quick with the help of this plugin. Within few minutes it migrated my company website to Cloudways with any error. It is one of the most valuable plugins I ever saw.

Thanks

Pramod

Easy to Transfer WordPress File

By Frucall (frucall) on August 29, 2022

I‘m really surprised to see the results.I just input existing wp data at cloudways migrator plugin within few min my site live at cloudways server.super fast amazing wp plugin for hosting file migration

Painfullly bad

By tim_marston on July 30, 2022

I gave up and had to use All in One Migration instead.

Great plugin, works seamlessly

By clayray on June 8, 2022

More robust than the Siteground Migrator.

Works great and better than most!

By ClikIT (BWW) on December 20, 2021

This plugin works better than UpDraft Migrator, Shipper, AIO, etc! I think because it uses direct ftp access, but it has made moving all of my sites to Cloudways so easy!
